name: $candidate
desc: The subject has agreed to participate in the study but has not yet begun performing any action within the study

name: $enrolled
desc: The subject is currently being monitored and/or subject to treatment as part of the study

name: $active
desc: The subject has temporarily discontinued monitoring/treatment as part of the study

name: $suspended
desc: The subject has permanently ended participation in the study prior to completion of the intended monitoring/treatment

name: $withdrawn
desc: All intended monitoring/treatment of the subject has been completed and their engagement with the study is now ended
